page.title: 17CUSTOMS SUMMER CARNIVAL
page.content: The annual carnival is held in July. The procession starts in Maes Hendre & there are lorries and cars and bikes. When the carnival starts The Royal Oakley Silver Band leads the procession. The floats and fancy dress competitions are adjudicated in the playing field. CARNIVAL WEEK Friday 5 to Saturday 13 Fri: 7-30 Country & Western Evening Sat: 10.00 Six a side Soccer Mon: 6.00 Treasure Hunt Tue: 7.00 Crowning of Queen Karen Wed: 1.00 School Sports 7.00 Darts Thur: 6.30 Competitions Fri: 6.30 Junior Disco Sat: Carnival Day
